title: TartanHQ
description: TartanHQ is solving the challenges of fragmented systems and inefficient workflows in enterprise organisations. We leverage the power of AI and unified API integrations to connect various third-party applications, such as HRMS (HROne, Keka), CRM (Zoho, Odoo), and ERP (SAP, Oracle) systems, to create intelligent, automated solutions. Whether you're building new applications or enhancing existing systems, Tartan provides the tools you need to connect, innovate, and automate.
